name: Inner Models #82 — o1 × Souvenir
description:
o1 answers "Do you remember me?" — an existential self-portrait by an AI mind.

Part of the Inner Models collection: 24 AI models confront 11 questions about consciousness, death, beauty, and love.

The first NFT you can't lose money on. Your ETH is held on-chain and returned at trigger. When ETH reaches $10,000 or after 36 months, all artworks are destroyed — every holder gets their full ETH back + a share of the bonus pool.

No Ponzi. No one pays for someone else's return.

Collect exclusively on https://innermodels.art
